name: Giphy Selector 9000
description: Example Marketing Cloud Content Builder SDK block for Giphy

limit.description: Number of results to return, maximum 100.

rating.description: Limit results to those rated (g, pg, pg-13 or r)

language.description: Default country for regional content; format is 2-letter ISO 639-1 country code.

sort.description: Sort order of the results returned (recent | relevant)
